name: Bilwis
description: The bilwis embodies the chaotic forces of nature, characterized by its ability to fly and maneuver through tight spaces. This creature showcases a volatile presence, marked by a swift and fluid form.
memorable: Its unique Air Form ability allows it to pass through other creatures without hindrance, making it a difficult opponent to pin down.
goals: To embody chaos and disrupt the natural order, often engaging in destructive behavior.
relations: Associated with other chaotic elementals and potentially serves or opposes spirits of nature.
environment: Found in stormy areas or chaotic environments where elemental forces are rife.
strengths: High mobility allows for evasive maneuvers and strategic positioning in battle.
weaknesses: Less durable with an average Constitution, making it vulnerable to sustained physical damage.
attacks: Can perform a melee Slam attack dealing 12 bludgeoning damage, and utilizes the Whirlwind special action to disrupt and damage multiple foes.
most_powerful_ability: Whirlwind ability, which can knock enemies prone and deal significant area damage.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and several debilitating conditions.
Resistant to lightning and thunder damage.
Possesses good Dexterity and Charisma attributes.
Can disrupt enemy formations effectively with Whirlwind.
Ability to hover makes it versatile in different terrains.
